name: Shelter (itch) (studiomilk)
description:
Shelter

A game made by Finn Fleming and Nichola Humphreys for The First Ever Charity Jam Against Homelessness

In keeping with the theme of the charity jam, our game is designed to help the player empathise and experience the plight of those who live on the streets.

Controls are WASD / Arrow Keys as well as Mouse Axes and LMB

Game Design by Nic and Finn   -   Game Dev and Art by Finn   -   Game Music by Nic

Please leave feedback!
